description.value: Your place in the balance between the forces of life and entropy expands the spells you can pull from the spirit realms. You add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Heal] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Harm] to your apparition spell repertoire, allowing you to cast them with your apparition spellcasting.
